source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of your Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath by 3%, stacking up to 10 times. Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!. Free Ferocious Bites are exempt from this chance.

Set: When you consume Apex Predator's Craving, become a Big Winner, dealing 1 million Physical damage to Apex Predator's primary target and increasing the damage of your periodic effects by 16% for 6 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,210 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Wrap of the Fixed Stars

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,996 to 4,884 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,884 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
G'Hanir, the Mother Tree
